example.text: The contaminated water was then withdrawn from the aquifer and fed into the JBPHH and distributed to thousands of mostly-but-not-exclusively military homes, offices and businesses. Many became ill as a direct result, and many more fear for longer term health impacts not immediately apparent.

We addressed the trafficking and use throughout Hawai'i of destructive illicit drugs like crystal methamphetamine (ice) and opioids (illegal or legal but abused), including the increasing presence of destructive fentanyl, and their widespread public safety, public health and community and family disruption consequences.
